food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟨 I am the color of the sun!
🐒 I'm a yummy treat for monkeys.
➡️ You peel my skin before you eat me.

food.question: I am red and round. You can bite into me or drink my juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 You can make a yummy drink from me.

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 Some people think I taste yummy with chocolate

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am Bugs Bunny's favorite treat!

food.question: I am long and green. You eat the seeds inside of me. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 You may see lots of little ones inside me.

food.question: I am small and blue. I grow on a bush and taste sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I am the color of the sky on a sunny day.
🥣 I taste good in muffins and cereal.

food.question: I am orange, but not a carrot. I am round and you can carve a face into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am used in Halloween decorations.
🥧 You can make a tasty pie out of me.

food.question: I am brown and grow underground. You can mash me, bake me, or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make yummy fries from me.
🇺🇸 I am a very popular food in America

food.question: I am made of milk. I can be hard or soft, and I taste good on crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Mice are thought to love me.
🍕 I often go on top of pizza.

food.question: I am made from wheat and baked in the oven. You can put jam or peanut butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

bug.question: I like to fly and have pretty wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 My wings have lots of colors.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.

bug.question: I crawl in the ground and live in a hill. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I buzz and make honey. What am I?
I jump really high and like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Some animals like to eat me!

bug.question: I am red with black spots. What am I?
I fly at night and like bright lights. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 Some look like butterflies at night.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 My light helps me find friends.

bug.question: I change into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I am green and eat leaves.

bug.question: I am long and crawl on the ground, sometimes with many legs! What am I?
